Name: Building destruction
About the game: Building destruction - an exciting physical game aimed at destroying buildings and various structures. Here you will find many exciting and exciting levels of varying difficulty. Take control of the sledgehammer and hammer and destroy whatever you want! There are many unique buildings and levels waiting for you in the game, so go through them all! Game Features: - Lots of levels - Complete destruction of objects - Physics - Colorful graphics
